metas.name: War Dogs
metas.description: Combines dark comedy with war themes, similar to Three Kings.

metas.name: In Bruges
metas.description: Dark comedy with crime elements, reminiscent of Get Shorty but with a more European sensibility.

metas.name: Zombieland
metas.description: Horror-comedy with a focus on survival, like 28 Days Later but with a lighter tone.

metas.name: Shaun of the Dead
metas.description: A classic horror-comedy blending British humor with zombie apocalypse, appealing to the horror and comedy aspects of their taste.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz
metas.description: Action-comedy with mystery elements, similar to Ace Ventura and Get Shorty but set in rural England.

metas.name: Seven Psychopaths
metas.description: Dark comedy with crime and thriller elements, aligning with Get Shorty and Wake Up Dead Man.

metas.name: Army of Darkness
metas.description: Horror-comedy with action and fantasy elements, appealing to their interest in KPop Demon Hunters and The Meteor Man.

metas.name: This Is the End
metas.description: Apocalyptic comedy with a meta and self-aware humor, similar to some of their other comedy choices.

metas.name: Tucker & Dale vs Evil
metas.description: A horror-comedy that subverts slasher tropes, fitting their preference for horror with comedic elements.

metas.name: The Nice Guys
metas.description: Comedy-mystery with action elements, similar to Wake Up Dead Man and Ace Ventura.

metas.name: Prisoners
metas.description: Dark thriller with strong performances and a compelling mystery, similar to The Shawshank Redemption but more intense.

metas.name: Sicario
metas.description: Gritty thriller with action and crime elements, like The Hurt Locker but focusing on the drug war.

metas.name: Wind River
metas.description: Thriller with mystery elements, similar to Wake Up Dead Man but with a more serious tone.

metas.name: Hell or High Water
metas.description: Crime thriller with strong character development, akin to The Shawshank Redemption but with a modern Western setting.

metas.name: Green Room
metas.description: Intense thriller with horror elements, fitting their interest in the genre mix of V/H/S/Halloween.

metas.name: The Guest
metas.description: Thriller with action and mystery elements, similar to The Running Man but with a smaller scale.

metas.name: Looper
metas.description: Sci-fi thriller with action elements, appealing to fans of The Running Man.

metas.name: Edge of Tomorrow
metas.description: Action sci-fi with a clever premise, similar to The Running Man but with a time loop twist.

metas.name: Upgrade
metas.description: Sci-fi action thriller with a dark tone, fitting their preference for genres like 28 Weeks Later and The Running Man.

metas.name: Dredd
metas.description: Action-packed sci-fi thriller, appealing to fans of The Running Man with its dystopian setting.

metas.name: A Fish Called Wanda
metas.description: Classic crime comedy with British humor, akin to Get Shorty but with a different flavor.

metas.name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
metas.description: Darkly comedic mystery with action elements, similar to Get Shorty and Ace Ventura.

metas.name: Snatch
metas.description: British crime comedy with a fast-paced plot, like Get Shorty but with a distinct Guy Ritchie style.

metas.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
metas.description: Another British crime comedy from Guy Ritchie, fitting their taste for Get Shorty and crime comedies.

metas.name: Grosse Pointe Blank
metas.description: Darkly comedic crime thriller with action elements, aligning with their enjoyment of Get Shorty.

metas.name: The Way of the Gun
metas.description: Neo-noir crime thriller with sharp dialogue and intense action.

metas.name: Training Day
metas.description: Gritty crime drama with strong performances and moral ambiguity, fitting the tone of The Shawshank Redemption.

metas.name: End of Watch
metas.description: Realistic and intense crime drama focusing on police officers, like The Hurt Locker but set in Los Angeles.

metas.name: Nightcrawler
metas.description: Dark and unsettling crime thriller with a captivating performance from Jake Gyllenhaal.

metas.name: Prison
metas.description: Horror thriller that could be similar in nature to the V/H/S series with its anthology theme.

metas.name: Dog Soldiers
metas.description: Horror-action that could be similar in the intensity and gore of movies like 28 Weeks Later.

metas.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
metas.description: Mystery thriller that could appeal to the mystery elements found in Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery.

metas.name: Parasite
metas.description: A thriller with comedy elements and a genre twist like Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery.

metas.name: I Saw the Devil
metas.description: Horror thriller that would appeal to fans of the horror/thriller themes like 28 Weeks Later.

metas.name: Forgotten
metas.description: Mystery thriller with dark tones that fans of The Shawshank Redemption will enjoy.

metas.name: Memories of Murder
metas.description: A crime thriller that fans of The Shawshank Redemption will enjoy.

metas.name: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
metas.description: Horror film with thriller aspects that could appeal to fans of V/H/S/Halloween.

metas.name: Train to Busan
metas.description: Action horror that fans of 28 Weeks Later will enjoy.

metas.name: No Tears for the Dead
metas.description: Action thriller that will appeal to the fan of The Hurt Locker.

metas.name: A Hard Day
metas.description: Action thriller that fans of the fast-paced action and suspense of The Running Man will enjoy.
